user.title: Enter API Key
user.description: Enter your Google Maps Platform API key. Make sure the Weather API is enabled in your Google Cloud project.

data_description.api_key: Your Google Maps Platform API key with Weather API enabled

location.title: Configure Location
location.description: Configure the location and settings for Google Weather. The location will default to your Home Assistant configuration.

data_description.location: Location name used for entity IDs (default: 'home'). Examples: 'home', 'office', 'gw_home'
data_description.latitude: Latitude coordinate for weather data (defaults to Home Assistant location)
data_description.longitude: Longitude coordinate for weather data (defaults to Home Assistant location)
data_description.unit_system: Choose metric (Celsius, km/h, mm) or imperial (Fahrenheit, mph, inches)

intervals.title: Configure Update Intervals
intervals.description: Set how often to update each endpoint during day and night. Google provides 10,000 free API calls/month (2,500 per endpoint). The defaults use approximately 2,500 calls/month per endpoint. All intervals are in minutes.

data_description.current_day_interval: How often to update current conditions during daytime (default: {current_day} min)
data_description.current_night_interval: How often to update current conditions at night (default: {current_night} min)
data_description.daily_day_interval: How often to update daily forecast during daytime (default: {daily_day} min)
data_description.daily_night_interval: How often to update daily forecast at night (default: {daily_night} min)
data_description.hourly_day_interval: How often to update hourly forecast during daytime (default: {hourly_day} min)
data_description.hourly_night_interval: How often to update hourly forecast at night (default: {hourly_night} min)
data_description.alerts_day_interval: How often to check weather alerts during daytime (default: {alerts_day} min)
data_description.alerts_night_interval: How often to check weather alerts at night (default: {alerts_night} min)
data_description.night_start: When nighttime update schedule begins (e.g., 22:00 for 10 PM)
data_description.night_end: When nighttime update schedule ends (e.g., 06:00 for 6 AM)

error.invalid_api_key: Invalid API key or Weather API not enabled. Please check your Google Cloud Console.
error.cannot_connect: Unable to connect to Google Weather API. Please check your network connection.

init.title: Update Google Weather Settings
init.description: Update location coordinates, unit system, and update intervals. Changes will take effect after reloading the integration.

data_description.unit_system: Choose metric (Celsius, km/h, mm) or imperial (Fahrenheit, mph, inches)
data_description.current_day_interval: How often to update current conditions during daytime (1-1440 minutes)
data_description.current_night_interval: How often to update current conditions at night (1-1440 minutes)
data_description.daily_day_interval: How often to update daily forecast during daytime (1-1440 minutes)
data_description.daily_night_interval: How often to update daily forecast at night (1-1440 minutes)
data_description.hourly_day_interval: How often to update hourly forecast during daytime (1-1440 minutes)
data_description.hourly_night_interval: How often to update hourly forecast at night (1-1440 minutes)
data_description.alerts_day_interval: How often to check weather alerts during daytime (1-1440 minutes)
data_description.alerts_night_interval: How often to check weather alerts at night (1-1440 minutes)
